main.name: Casey Wood
main.description: with eclectic tasts, love for mind bending puzzles and appretiates nerdy, progress driven cultrues
main.bio: I moved to Vancouver with the intent in developing my career into the tech industry. If I could spend the rest of my days building and creating I would be totally content. The process of analyizing planning and developing new project is something that has always brought me great joy. my interests that have followed me around out side of my careers have been a heavy obssion with the table top war game Warhammer including general minurature hobbies, various forms of juggling and building and tweaking my home computer and electronics

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
